Cheers!

THIS IS AMAZING!! I CAN'T BELIEVE IT!!

THANK YOU GUYS!! xD

I was there when you got 10000 downloads, and I NEVER thought KSP would grow this explosively.

congrats, and good luck.

There's a Kurt Kobain joke in here somewhere...
